name: The Devil's Backbone from Lolinda
description: Much as he loves the smoky flavor of peated scotch, Lane acknowledges that an entire cocktail made with it is pretty aggressive. To avoid having that smoke be all you can taste, Lane cuts the flavor with a bit of spicy rye.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce Lagavulin 16-year-old Single Malt Scotch Whisky (Ardbeg is a good substitute)

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a mixing glass with ice. Add rye, Averna, Scotch, Gran Classico, and bitters. Stir for 30 seconds, or until well chilled. Strain into a coupe.
